The world will never be converted by conformity to its evil practices. But what an influence will be exerted upon the world by a people who live and speak and acts as sons and daughters of God, as citizens of heaven itself! We should be as salt with all its saving properties. Oh, what witnesses we would be for Christ! What a power would be our example to the world. We could lift up our 


                                   -279- 

voice like a trumpet, and show "My people their transgression, and the house of Jacob their sins."
